item.title: Integrating Renewables Into The Grid With Machine Learning
item.description: Renewables, such as solar and wind, are beginning to reach economies of scale and, in some cases, are already cheaper than more traditional power plants burning coal and natural gas [1]. For the purposes of this post, I will mainly focus on utility-scale solar, which will help to simplify the conversation. Solar is improving fast with photovoltaics, inverters, and batteries getting better everyday. Solar is economically cheaper, therefore in an ideal homo economicus framed world solar should be everywhere.
